name: Suki Sites Import
author: Suki WordPress Theme

sections.description:
Kickstart your project with our ready-to-use templates (demo sites) built for Elementor and Gutenberg. Choose among different categories and niches, such as blog, online stores, portfolio, wedding, restaurant, company profile, etc. And then simply import the demo site that you like into your own website instantly.

This plugin requires Suki WordPress theme to be installed.

About PRO Demo Sites

In addition to the FREE demo sites, we also have some PRO demo sites which are more advanced and detailed. In order to import the PRO demo sites, you would need an active license of Suki Pro – Design Plan. Learn more about Suki Pro and its full features on our website.

Disclaimer

This plugin will retrieve and fetch demo sites list from our server through API calls. We will use some of your data, like your site URL and your license key of Suki Pro (if any), to validate the access privilege to our PRO demo sites. The PRO demo sites can only be imported when you have an active and valid license of Suki Pro – Design plan. Your data remains safe with us and won’t be shared to other 3rd parties.

By using this plugin you accept and agree to this policy.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for “Suki Sites Import” and wait until the plugin appears in the results.
  3. Install the plugin and then activate it right away.
  4. Go to Appearance > Sites Import to see the available demo sites.
sections.faq:
Will this Suki Sites Import plugin work with any theme?

All demo sites are built using Suki WordPress theme. Therefore, in order to use this plugin and import the demo site, you would need to install Suki WordPress theme.

Will you add more demo sites?

Yes! We continuously add new demo sites in various categories and niches. You will automatically see updates in the plugin’s page whenever we added new demo sites.
sections.changelog:
v1.2.1

  • TWEAK: Improve contents XML file upload (do not upload it as attachment).

v1.2.0

  • NEW: Add Elementor kit support for new demos.

v1.1.0

  • NEW: Use Sever Sent Events API for importing contents.
  • TWEAK: Disable automatic WooCommerce pages creation to avoid duplicate pages when importing (since WooCommerce 4.6).
  • TWEAK: Add warning notice to disable WP_DEBUG mode.
  • FIX: Compatibility for Elementor 3.0.x

v1.0.4

  • FIX: Javascript error when importing on some PHP servers.

v1.0.2

  • FIX: PHP Warning of undefined constant.

v1.0.1

  • TWEAK: Translation loader.
  • FIX: Error 500 when importing contents on some PHP servers.

v1.0.0

  • Initial release.
